success_sign_in: Success: You are now signed in.
success_reset: Password Reset Successful: Your password has been successfully reset.
success_refresh_token: Success! A new access token has been issued.
success_logout: Success! You have been Safely logged out of your current session. We hope to see you again soon!
error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again later.
error_unauthorized_generic: You are not authorized to access this resource.
error_not_found_generic: The requested resource could not be located.
error_unauthenticated: Oops! It looks like you need to authenticate. Please log in or register to access this resource.
error_unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this :resource.
error_not_found_or_not_allow: The :resource could not be located or You do not have access permission
error_resource_create: Failed to create the :resource. Please try again.
error_resource_update: Update failed. The :resource could not be updated.
error_resource_delete: Deletion failed. The :resource could not be removed.
error_invalid_creds: The provided credentials are not valid
error_logout_failed: We’re sorry, but we couldn’t log you out at this moment. Please try again later.
error_user_not_blocked: Oops! The user is not blocked.
error_user_not_found: Oops! The user is not found.
error_token_not_found: Oops! The token is not found.
error_user_not_allowed: Oops! The user is not allowed.
user_already_blocked: Oops! The user is already blocked.
error_unique_identifier: The :attribute must be unique among email, username, and mobile columns.
error_you_are_blocked: Your account has been temporarily suspended due to policy violations. Please contact support for further assistance.
error_too_much_attempts: You have exceeded the maximum number of authentication attempts. Please wait for :minutes minutes before trying again. If you continue to see this message, please contact our support team.
